result.reason: The crash is documented as a Microsoft upstream RDP/MSCTF issue and was reported fixed by Windows updates, so there is no actionable mRemoteNG-side fix.
result.approach: Close as vendor/upstream resolved and advise affected users to install the relevant Windows cumulative updates.
